item.title: Medical Device Manufacturers Redefine Quality
item.description: Medical device manufacturers are transforming inspection processes and supplier management to meet new quality demands amidst digital and regulatory pressures.

item.title: Siemens Targets Sub-Nanometer Era with AI Metrology Acquisition
item.description: Siemens acquires Canopus AI to enhance semiconductor manufacturing precision with computational and AI-driven metrology solutions for wafer inspection.

item.title: Nikon Advances Vision-Based Metrology with Next-Generation AutoMeasure Software
item.description: Nikon unveils new AutoMeasure software for NEXIV video measuring systems, simplifying dimensional measurement for operators with intelligent features.

item.title: Siemens’ Digital Twin Composer Brings Real-Time Intelligence to the Factory Digital Twin
item.description: Siemens launches Digital Twin Composer to build Industrial Metaverse environments at scale, enabling virtual decision-making with real-time physical data.

item.title: Hexagon’s HYPERSCAN Drives Industrial 3D Inspection
item.description: Hexagon introduces HYPERSCAN, a robust 3D scanning solution for complex industrial environments, combining speed and flexibility to transform inspection processes.

item.title: The Pursuit of Zero-Defect Manufacturing
item.description: Zero-defect manufacturing is an ambitious goal in industrial quality control, now becoming a reality with advanced technologies and real-time feedback.

item.title: ISO 9001 in 2026: What’s Changing
item.description: ISO 9001 in 2026: What’s Changing - Quality Magazine
